name: Soft Drizzle
description:
Soft Drizzle is a short, 64x64 resolution visual novel about friendship and rainy days.

Made in 7 days for LOWREZJAM 2020. 

I had a lot of fun developing this game, I hope you enjoy it!

Please bear in mind that, at the moment, the game doesn't save your progress. A whole playthrough should be 15 - 20 minutes long.

Controls
  • Click to advance the text.
  • Space to turn AUTO mode, in case you just want to sit back and just read without having to click.
  • Click to select an option when prompted.
Credits

I composed the music and drew the character sprites and UI, etc. The subway and rain sound effects were created by TheMSsoundeffects and ThunderSlav, respectively.
